summary: Completed comprehensive testing of wedding gallery app. Backend APIs 100% passing (25/25 tests). Frontend features working correctly including login, folder creation, file selection mode, Select All/Deselect All, Download All/Selected, Delete Selected with confirmation, and file preview modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Upload dropzone intercepts pointer events on file cards when hovering. Users need to use JavaScript clicks or scroll to interact with files. The dropzone overlay extends over the file grid area.

passed_tests: Frontend: Download Selected button (enabled when files selected)
Frontend: Delete Selected button (enabled when files selected)
Frontend: Preview modal has download and close buttons
action_items: Fix upload dropzone z-index/pointer-events issue - dropzone intercepts clicks on file cards below it
critical_code_review_comments: FolderManager.js: The dropzone component overlaps the file grid area, causing pointer event interception. Consider adding pointer-events: none to the dropzone when not actively dragging, or restructure the layout so dropzone doesn't overlap files.
seed_data_creation: Reset admin password to 'admin123' for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_api.py cover auth, folders, files, shares, and stats. Admin credentials: admin/admin123. Minor UI issue with dropzone overlay intercepting file card clicks - can be worked around with JavaScript clicks or scrolling.
